metadata.Title: CVE-2021-29945 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: The WebAssembly JIT could miscalculate the size of a return type, whichcould lead to a null read and result in a crash. *Note: This issue onlyaffected x86-32 platforms. Other platforms are unaffected.*. Thisvulnerability affects Firefox ESR < 78.10, Thunderbird < 78.10, and Firefox< 88.

criterions.comment: firefox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
